Disclaimer

This page outlines important legal notices, responsibilities, and limitations for using the Facebook Video Downloader. Please review carefully.

Last Updated: Sep 2025

1. General Disclaimer

The Facebook Video Downloader ("Service") is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the results.

Note: Use of the Service is at your own risk. We are not liable for any damages arising from its use.

Scope of Information

Information on this site is for general informational purposes only and may change without notice.

2. No Affiliation with Facebook

We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Facebook, Meta Platforms, Inc., or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates. The name "Facebook" is a registered trademark of its respective owner.

Trademarks

All trademarks, service marks, and trade names used are the property of their respective owners and are used for identification purposes only.

3. Content Ownership & Copyright

All content retrieved via the Service belongs to its original creators and rights holders. You are solely responsible for ensuring that your use of any content complies with copyright law and applicable licenses.

Permitted Use

  • Download only content you own or have explicit permission to use
  • Respect fair use, Creative Commons, and other licensing terms
  • Do not redistribute copyrighted content without authorization

We do not store, host, or distribute videos. We provide temporary links to publicly available resources.

4. Acceptable Use & Restrictions

You agree not to:

  • Use the Service to download private/restricted content
  • Bypass or attempt to circumvent platform security
  • Use downloads for commercial purposes without rights
  • Violate any applicable laws or Facebook policies

User Responsibility

You are responsible for your actions and for verifying the legality of your downloads.

5. Technical Limitations

  • No guarantee that every video can be downloaded
  • Third-party changes (e.g., Facebook updates) may affect functionality
  • Temporary outages or maintenance may occur

We make reasonable efforts to maintain reliability and compatibility, but the Service may change without notice.

6. Liability & Indemnification

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from or related to your use of the Service.

Indemnity

You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from claims arising from your misuse of the Service or violation of these disclaimers and related terms.

7. Third-Party Links & Services

The Service may link to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party sites.

We recommend reviewing the privacy policies and terms of any third-party services you use.

8. Changes to this Disclaimer

We may update this Disclaimer from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Please review this page periodically.

Tip: Bookmark this page to quickly check for updates.

Questions?

If you have any questions about this Disclaimer or how it applies to you, please reach out.
